data.actual_result: You see some nicknames but you see some usernames even though they have nicknames.
data.expected_result: You see all nicknames in the chat.
data.short_description: Nickname Displays as Username in Mentions (Make sure to try it multiple times if needed)
data.steps_to_repro: - Join or use a server with multiple people who uses nickname. - Have someone or yourself mention / ping a few random people with  - Restart Discord (if needed.)
